snippet: The move came as part of a promise by Myanmar’s president to free all such detainees by the end of the year.
abstract: Myanmar's president pardons 69 political prisoners as part of promise to free all such detainees by end of 2013.
lead_paragraph: The move came as part of a promise by Myanmar’s president to free all such detainees by the end of the year.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
